name: 曾世杰
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule: 1. Measurement 2. Motion Along a Straight Line, Vectors 3. Motion in Two and Three Dimensions 4. Force and Motion—I 5. Force and Motion—II 6.Kinetic Energy and Work 7.Potential Energy and Conservation of Energy 8. Center of Mass and Linear Momentum 9. Rotation,Rolling, Torque, and Angular Momentum 10.Rolling, Torque, and Angular Momentum Equilibrium and Elasticity 11.Gravitation 12. Fluids 13.Oscillations 14.Waves—I 15.Waves—II 16.Waves—II
